casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
SHAW S246465 Supreme Court of California MARCH 14, 2018 Votes: Chin, A. C. J., Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in In re H.W., S237415 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court. Cantil-Sakauye, C. J., was recused and did not participate.
